Part IV: (3)   All other provisions of this Act except the provisions of Part IV and Part V, shall come into operation on such date as the
Minister may, appoint by Order published in the Gazette, which shall be a date not earlier than eighteen months and not

Major Legislative Enactments of 2022: later than thirty six months from the date of the certificate of the Speaker referred to in subsection (2).

Part IV: (4)   The date of operation of the provisions of Part IV of this Act, shall be a date not earlier than twenty-four months and not

Major Legislative Enactments of 2022: later than forty-eight months from the date of certificate referred to in subsection (2).

Part IV: (5)  The date of operation of the provisions of Part V of this Act shall be a date appointed by the Minister by Order published

Major Legislative Enactments of 2022: in the Gazette which shall be a date not later than the date appointed by the Minister under subsection (3).
